summary:
These are 2 shields (1 light and 1 heavy) based on TV Series GoT. I decide to use my imagination once again. Original shields
of House Baratheon looks too ugly in my opinion so i decide to create something more noble and attractive.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]TnTx0-O4S-s[/youtube]
[img]http://www.gameofthronescharacters.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/House-Baratheon.jpg[/img]

=============================================================================================================================
=================================================== Shields of House Baratheon ==============================================
=============================================================================================================================




- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Version: v1.0 (26/7/2014)- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -



These are 2 shields (1 light and 1 heavy) based on TV Series GoT. I decide to use my imagination once again. Original shields
of House Baratheon looks too ugly in my opinion so i decide to create something more noble and attractive.

I had doubts about my success but eventually i decide to place them in nexus to see what other pople will say about them.
Therefore i will appreciate all opinions from nexus users.





=================================================== Heavy Baratheon's Shield ================================================



It have similar stats as orcish shield but i decide to change recipe a bit.
You can craft it under orcish section. ("orcish smithing" perk)


You will need:


- 2 iron ingots
- 2 ebony ingots
- 2 dwarven ingots
- 2 leathers strips



=================================================== Light Baratheon's Shield ================================================




It have similar stats as orcish shield but i decide to change recipe a bit.
You can craft it under orcish section. ("orcish smithing" perk)


You will need:


- 2 steel ingots
- 2 golden ingots
- 2 orichalcum ingots
- 2 leathers strips




====================================================== Install ==============================================================


To install:

- Unpack and place folder named Data into Skyrim's main folder ( C:\....\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\ )


==============================================================================================================================



Please feel free to share your opinion. Any feedback and suggestions are appreciated.


-zajkoajko-
author: zajkoajko
